description:
UMD 3.12.0 is the thirteen update, a minor update, of the third Major release of UMD 
(Unified Middleware Distribution) made available for the EGI production 
infrastructure. This release contains support for both Scientific Linux 5
 and 6.
releaseNotes:
This release contains the following products:<br><br>Authorization<br><ul><li><b>ARGUS-PAP, v. 1.6.4</b>, versions for SL5 and SL6:</li><ul><li>This release provides a fix for the following issue: https://github.com/argus-authz/argus-pap/issues, that caused SSL authentication errors for the pap-admin client after the upgrade to the latest JRE.<br><br></li></ul></ul><blockquote><ul></ul></blockquote> File Access,File Transfer,Storage Management
<ul><li><b>dCache server, v.2.10.24, </b>versions for SL5 and SL6:</li><ul><li>This is a major upgrade fro dCache from 2.6 to 2.10. Please have a look for details at: <a href="http://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-2.10.shtml">http://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-2.10.shtml</a></li></ul></ul>
installationNotes:
All products in the UMD 3.12.0 release were verified against EGI's 
current&nbsp; Quality Criteria (for further information, please see the 
documentation links) to support Scientific Linux 5 and Scientific
 Linux 6 (x86_64 processor architecture).&nbsp; Installation and configuration 
notes are available in the <a href="http://repository.egi.eu/category/umd_releases/distribution/umd-3/">EGI repository.</a>
contact:
For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and
more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please
send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release <br>notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the <br>Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="https://ggus.eu/">EGI Helpdesk</a> to make a report.
knownIssues: Details containing known issues and workarounds found in EGI verification and <br>staged rollout are collected in:<br><a href="http://https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-3:UMD-3.12.0">https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-3:UMD-3.12.0</a>
changeLog: This releases includes updates for the following products:ARGUS-PAP and dCache server.

products.name: dcache.dcache
products.description: dCache provides system for storing and retrieving huge amounts of data, distributed among a large number of heterogenous server nodes, under a single virtual filesystem tree with a variety of standard access methods.
products.changeLog: This is a major upgrade fro dCache from 2.6 to 2.10. Please have a look for details at: http://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-2.10.shtml#24

products.name: emi.argus-pap
products.changeLog: This release provides a fix for the following issue: https://github.com/argus-authz/argus-pap/issues, that caused SSL authentication errors for the pap-admin client after the upgrade to the latest JRE.
